title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Sep 1 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Sep 1 2021
description:
Joining C&B: Glenn Beck, nationally syndicated radio host and founder of TheBlaze.com, on helping evacuate Christians from Afghanistan. Bill Belichick comments on whether Cam Newton vaccination status led to his release from the New England Patriots. CDC new guidelines for unvaccinated: Don't travel. Two top vaccine officials resign from FDA amid political pressure from Biden administration. Drinking pumpkin flavor spice seltzer while riding on an e-scooter?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
